Painter Essentials 7 (Windows/Mac)

Painting software for beginners

  • User-friendly interface
  • Al-based photo painting
  • Industry-acclaimed brushes
  • Incredible speed
  • Built-in learnig
  • OVERVIEW
  • FEATURES
  • COMPARE
  • TECH SPECS
  • GALLERY
  • LEARNING

The ideal painting software for beginners

Start your creative journey with Painter® Essentials™ 7, the best paint program for beginners to explore and expand
artistic curiosity using impressive, easy-to-learn tools.

Distinctive Artificial Intelligence based photo painting

Produce incredible photo art with ease by converting your favorite photos into paintings using neural networking and
the strength of Painter’s brush engine! Choose from an impressive range of AI styles for photo painting, including
Bold Watercolor, Colored Pencil, Colorful Dabs, Impressionist, Smooth Acrylic, Van Gogh, Watercolor Portrait, and
Charcoal Drawing.

Flexible photo painting tools

Open your image and the painting choice is yours. Auto-Paint, in one click, with AI, or SmartStroke™ technology that
rapidly produces stunning results. Clone paint by dipping any brush you like directly into the photo, or trace by turning on
tracing paper and selecting a brush and color while using the image as your guide.

Experiment with blank canvas
painting

Immerse yourself in an intriguing collection of
realistic brushes and canvas textures that respond
to your every move when using a pressure-
sensitive drawing tablet. Dry, wet, springy,
speckled, spattered, glowing, gooey, patterned
media is at the ready, allowing you to bring your
wildest ideas to life.

Industry-acclaimed brushes

Create with artist-trusted brushes. Every brush in
Essentials was custom selected for new digital
artists from our professional Painter art studio so
that you can comfortably ease into your digital art
experience.

Tools and effects to inspire you

Mirror
Navigator
Kaleidoscope
Woodcut
Apply Lighting

Additional brush packs

Browse our outrageously creative brush packs to
enhance any kind of painting. Simplify your
workflow with the perfect brush pack
solution.

Explore our Learning Portal

Find just what you need to succeed! Tons of
useful tutorial videos await you in our Discovery
Center. You can also share artwork, benefit from
tips, register for webinars and enter contests.
